issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KitchenSink, Base UI>Views>Options Dialog, I pressed "modify and show dialog" (the bottom one) prior to "Show Dialog 1" and was presented with an empty dialog. See attached image

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.7 on Android device
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Options Dialog
3) Press "modify and show dialog" (the bottom one)
4) Dismiss the dialog by pressing "ok"
5) Press "Show Dialog 1"

Result:
Empty dialog shown

Expected Result:
No empty dialog

Notes:
Occurs in KS 1.6.2
fields.summary: Android: KitchenSink Base UI>Views>Options Dialog: It's possible to generate empty dialog
fields.environment: Android Eris (2.1), Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105241943, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r294b6aa5

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer in use.
